channel.title: [Buying] Specific Enchanted items
channel.description:
Buying the Following: Enchanted
Bows Diamond Axes (Woodcutting axes, not pics) Diamond Swords Diamond Pickaxes And Diamond Armor
THEY MUST BE UNUSED OR EVER SO SLIGHTLY USED OR NO DEAL
As for what enchantments to have, I'll pay different depending on the enchantments, for the Bows, I'm mainly looking for fire and power, though infinity wouldn't hurt.
For the armor, I'm looking for anything you can get on them, but not weak things.
For axes, I'm looking for mostly efficiency, unbreaking wouldn't hurt.
For swords, almost anything! Nothing too weak though.
Same with pics, not looking in specific for fortune or anything, but again, nothing too weak. If the enchantments are too weak, might not even buy it.
Post here if you have anything!

[/quote]

no i only stole the power 5 punch 2 one the other was crap so i left it[/quote]
jelly

either way still buying
